textAfterTable: I've developed software for Microsoft platforms since the early 90's. I have a lot of previous experience with C++ and MFC, and have been working with C# and .NET for the past decade. Multi-threaded applications, networking, and communications have always been my specialty. I've been developing for the iOS platform since the first iPhone was introduced and also have experience developing for Android and Google Glass. More recently I've been focusing on web application development using ASP.NET MVC, WebApi, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap and Angular. I've also spent some time working with Node.js. I am a certified ScrumMaster and have successfully implemented Scrum at several companies. 193 reputation bio website alanchavis.com visits member for 4 years, 11 months 1 8 badges location Eagle, CO seen Aug 7 '12 at 17:06 summary answers questions
